purpose: The email announces the IEEE Annual Congress on Artificial Intelligence of Things (IEEE AIoT 2024) scheduled for July 24-26, 2024, in Melbourne, Australia. It provides important details such as submission deadlines, topics of interest, and the structure of the conference. The conference aims to bring together various stakeholders in the fields of AI and IoT to discuss innovative solutions and establish collaborations. It also highlights opportunities for best paper awards and potential fast-track publications in reputable journals.
